mean_cn: adj. 突出的，爱管闲事的，冒失的，强迫人的
mean_en: tending to bother people by appearing where you are not welcome or invited
sentence: The shabby house is obtrusive amid the high-rises in the urban setting.
sentence_trans: 这栋破房子在高楼耸立的城市中显得很扎眼。
word_etyma: obtrus强迫 ＋ ive表示有...性质的、有...作用的、有...倾向的 → obtrusive突出的；强迫人的；冒失的
